```{r}

library(tidyverse)

totab <- tibble()
for (i in seq(0, 1, 0.1)) {
  if (i == 0) {
    i <- '0.0'
  }
  if (i == 1) {
    i <- '1.0'
  }
  totab <- bind_rows(totab, read_csv(paste0('joint_mat_', i, '.csv'), show_col_types = FALSE) |> mutate(m = as.character(i)))
}

```

```{r fig.height=10, fig.width=12}

totab |> 
  # group_by(m, From) |>
  # mutate(Prob = Prob/sum(Prob)) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_tile(aes(From, To, fill = Prob)) +
  geom_text(aes(From, To, label = round(Prob, 3))) +
  facet_wrap(~m) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c()
  

```
